reviewText: The original film is a true classic. The sequel is pretty awful, with too many changes from the book. In an over-effort to be inclusive it verges on being ridiculous. What a wasted opportunity. :(

Molly's Pilgrim is the absolute best anti-bullying film EVER.  Every time that I see it I find myself crying as if I've never seen it before.  This show teaches kids a great lesson about considering the feelings of others.  You can't do better.
